document_data.name: Ogden Fastrunner
document_data.mainbody: ''' Ogden Fastrunner''' was a male [[human]] commander of a [[Cormyr]]ean patrol during the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History:
Ogden was the captain of a [[Cormyr]]ean patrol that was patrolling the near the city of [[Marsember]] during the Time of Troubles when a strange poisonous fog killed him and his men. He later rose as an [[undead]] creation under the order of the god of the dead, [[Myrkul]].

Myrkul ordered the risen Ogden and his men to capture [[Midnight]], but in the end they were all destroyed.{{cite book/Waterdeep|4-6}}
